summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4917 for the improvement of Seaview Avenue, from West 60th Street to West 65th Street; by constructing watermains together with fire hydrants and the necessary appurtances, under Ordinance No. 56326 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll , establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
